text.english: Precious in the sight of the LORD Is the death of His saints. O LORD, truly I am Your servant; I am Your servant, the son of Your maidservant; You have loosed my bonds.
text.arabic: عَزِيزٌ فِي عَيْنَيِ الرَّبِّ مَوْتُ أَتْقِيَائِهِ. آهِ يَا رَبُّ. لأَنِّي عَبْدُكَ. أَنَا عَبْدُكَ ابْنُ أَمَتِكَ. حَلَلْتَ قُيُودِي.
